name: Surprise Party!
description:
Surprise Party! Is a Puzzle/Adventure game where you play as a Balloon?!
It all started out like every other escapade led by Bob and his friends. Kids meet up without telling their parents, kids try and break into a circus... only this time, it ended up with them meeting someone intending to throw the entire universe into impending doom.

But a hero always rises up in the face of disaster, right?

FEATURES

• Explore 5 differently themed stages, all riddled with spooky delight!

• Avoid enemies in the dark while you solve a variety of Puzzles!

• You're a Balloon, silly! Don't Get Popped!

• Use Magical Plushies to transform into 3 different Balloon Animals, each with their own special ability!

• Meet a cast of colourful characters!

• Based in France! Escargots included!

• Collaborative Sound Track, featuring work by Matthew Colucci, Jake Musumeci, Nicholas Hartill-Law, YouFulca, and Jonathan Shaw!

• Custom level-picking structure, partial voice over... and MORE!

PLEASE NOTE: Although Surprise Party! is intended for all ages, very young players may be frightened by some scenes or themes.
